items.title: Mentor by eDriving
items.description: At eDriving, I helped create Mentor, a smartphone app that collects data while driving and analyzes it to detect bad driving and help the driver improve. I wrote custom analytics algorithms in Java based on academic research, and fine-tuned the data collection algorithms on iOS and Android. I also wrote data collection firmware for an Arduino OBDII device using the C programming language.

items.title: WebVR Platform
items.description: At Flow.gl I worked on a 3D data visualization software platform, a create-your-own data visualization web app built with Vue.js and Node.js, and custom immersive experiences for Fortune 500 clients.

items.title: Internal Software at Google
items.description: As a full stack engineer at Google, I worked on a bill of materials tracking system and network inventory planning software. I worked with TypeScript, Angular.js, and Golang.

items.title: Social Media AI SaaS
items.description: I created a Node.js backend API which took data from the AI pipeline and used it to respond to user queries, with around 10x performance improvement over the company's original prototype. I also added multiple features to the React.js frontend and served as the administrator for the CMS.

items.title: Recobot
items.description: (2017 - 2019) A recommendation algorithm for anything. Used Node.js and MongoDB on Google Cloud VPS.

items.title: ThreeTwist
items.description: A project I worked on in college, ThreeTwist is a rewrite of cuber.js, which powered Google's Rubik's cube doodle in honor of Ern≈ë Rubik. ThreeTwist adds puzzle cubes of any order, such as 5x5x5. It also fixes some bugs and adds new features, like an API for visualizing "algorithms".

items.title: Tween.js
items.description: I was a maintainer for the open source project Tween.js for several years. It is a lightweight JavaScript animation library.

items.title: Solidity Smart Contracts
items.description: I wrote some open source smart contracts with Solidity. I am very interested in exploring the novel possibilities of smart contracts.

items.title: naturalgfx.com
items.description: In 2017, I created the business website for Natural Graphics. The client's original website was created in the 2000's with Dreamweaver. I modernized it with a responsive design, added a custom image carousel, and improved the organization of the content.
